params.about_text: My name in Nikhil Jain. I am from Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh. Currently I am pursuing by bachelors in computer science and engineering from Jabalpur Engineering College, Jabalpur with an aggregate cgpa of 8.59. I have consistently performed well in my academics and have secured 89.4% in 12th and 9.8 cgpa in 10th. As in todays world computer science is everywhere so i decided to invest my 3-4 years of my collage time in building my technical skills. My technical skills includes problem solving, and likes to do programming in various languages like c, c++, java, python. Have good knowledge of Data Structures and Algorithms. Active on various online competitive programming platforms such as Codeforces, CodeChef and Leetcode and have solved 1000+ DSA problems.I am also familiar with web development which includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript. besides that I am also familiar with Machine Learning, databases and SQL Queries.
